select wh_machine_part.c_id as wh_id, wh_machine_part.c_num as wh_num, machine_part.c_id as machine_part_id, machine_part.c_pn as machine_part_pn, machine_part.c_name as machine_part_name, unit.c_id as unit_id, unit.c_name as unit_name, supplier.c_id as supplier_id, supplier.c_name as supplier_name from warehouse_machine_part_tbl as wh_machine_part left join machine_part_tbl as machine_part on wh_machine_part.c_machine_part_id = machine_part.c_id left join unit_tbl as unit on machine_part.c_unit_id = unit.c_id left join supplier_tbl as supplier on machine_part.c_supplier_id = supplier.c_id
and machine_part.c_pn like '%${machinePart.pn}%'
